```{r}

```

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
stat113_df <- read_csv("https://raw.githubusercontent.com/highamm/ds234_quarto/main/data_online/stat113.csv")
stat113_df

ggplot(data = stat113_df, aes(x = GPA)) +
  geom_histogram()

ggplot(data = stat113_df, aes(x = GPA)) +
  geom_histogram(colour = "black", fill = "white", bins = 17)
```
